snippet: In separate incidents, 10 girls were killed when a roadside bomb exploded, police said, and a suicide bomber targeted a military contractor in Kabul.
abstract: Suicide bomber driving car packed with explosives targets compound of private military contractor on outskirts of Kabul, Afghanistan, killing at least one person and injuring at least 15 others, including foreigners; in separate episode, 10 girls are killed in rural district of eastern Afghanistan when roadside bomb explodes while they were collecting firewood.

byline.original: By GRAHAM BOWLEY and HABIB ZAHORI
byline.contributor: Sharifullah Sahak contributed reporting from Kabul, and Khalid Alokozai from Nangarhar Province, Afghanistan.

lead_paragraph: In separate incidents, 10 girls were killed when a roadside bomb exploded, police said, and a suicide bomber targeted a military contractor in Kabul.

headline.seo: Blast Kills 10 Girls in Eastern Afghanistan; Car Bomber Targets Kabul
headline.main: Blast Kills 10 Girls in Eastern Afghanistan; Car Bomber Targets Kabul
headline.print_headline: 10 Young Girls Are Killed in Afghan Bombings
